name: Ghostlore (Web version)
description:
Ghostlore is a fantasy RPG inspired by Singapore and Southeast Asia.

This is a demo containing 1 quest.

Please be patient while the game downloads.

---

Controls

WASD to move (Change in Configuration for mouse movement)

Drag and drop items and powers onto your hotbar.

---

Ghostlore is an early work-in-progress. Expect bugs and issues.

Known issues:

You may need to click the black border if keyboard input does not work.
